bdi4jade.plan

Class OrPlanGoalDependency

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.plan.PlanGoalDependency
      • bdi4jade.plan.OrPlanGoalDependency

  • public class OrPlanGoalDependency
extends PlanGoalDependency
    This class represents an OR dependency between a plan and a set of goals. It means that this plan needs that one of these goals that it depends on must be achieved so that the plan can be completed. As solely one of the goals must be achieved, this class stores the probability of each particular goal to be achieved during the plan execution.
    Author:
    ingrid
